Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel in a pleasant and peaceful neighborhood”
Reviews.Author: elisabethabib
Reviews.Content: hotel hotel pleasant peaceful neighborhood rome staff polite helpful wide clean bathroom satellite tv possibility watching original language english plus comfortable breakfast topnotch ready day hotel 30min bus termini station 2 buses difficult reach city center ie piazza venezia tourist time ahead course tourist hurry recommend hotel neighborhood pleasant peaceful embassies consulates secure lot restaurants found

Reviews.Title: “Average all round, Uninterested Staff”
Reviews.Author: Connel90
Reviews.Content: arrived hotel receptionist sitting looked acknowledged carried computer leaving standing 10 minutes finished business walked round checked smile impressions unfortunately wasnt staff behaviour carried throughout stay pleasantly surprised spacious clean bed extremely comfortable downside size bath indeed breakfast morning bit cereals left night stale pastries bread covered stale breakfast entirety bread rolls cereal pastries tinned fruit hotel little due public transport pose leads nights sleep access priced quality restaurants taverna rossini return rome tempted stay choose hotel friendly tourists

Reviews.Title: “It's OK”
Reviews.Author: AussieRandR
Reviews.Content: hotel located residential quiet closest restaurants 10 minutes walk restaurant recommended front desk manager food excellent staff friendly helpful own minor added frustrating 2 extra pillows bedside lights broken strong smell sewage front door shower joke cubicle hot water cold dribble tv didnt accordance instructions 2 attempts staff eventually vital step missing instructions door balcony locked catch broken front desk dont worry honest neighborhood fifth floor anyway dont expect wont disappointed closer centre money

Reviews.Title: “Not bad”
Reviews.Author: Mayberries
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights tour package europe hotel located residential hotel little revamping updating bed comfortable bathroom clean staff friendly service breakfast average bar staff christmas day spent night considering major holiday italy services provided hotel

Reviews.Title: “clean, quiet and good value”
Reviews.Author: wherescharlie
Reviews.Content: stayed nights 2011 15 euros taxi fare termini station located quiet street scooter noise reception staff efficient duty manager particularly helpful maps bus advice bus stop 100m regular service city centre local cafe fresh coffee 80 cents sells bus tickets spacious clean satellite tv free internet access issue informed roman law dictates air conditioning switched july sticky 14 degrees night window wide coped overall nice clean quiet hotel

Reviews.Title: “Pass this one up”
Reviews.Author: mountainview03
Reviews.Content: hotel 4 star rating according reviewers look decorated tubs weve seen italy half glass enclosure instead extends length tub arrangement allows floor time freeze death taking shower worst hotel weve stayed italy staff snooty appear busy playing computers stop moment answer questions clients sins forgiven staff friendly helpful restaurant themselves provide breakfast instead bag breakfast laughable contained soft apple wax carton container apricot juice little debbie style cookie yuk ate baby beside cried intermittently night charged 15 euros day internet access takes looks hotel nice doesnt pass test

Reviews.Title: “Dusty Dusty Dusty”
Reviews.Author: lshopsonline
Reviews.Content: boscolo hotel via priceline bid price paid couldve booked bb boscolo hotel considered 4star hotel 4star arrived noonish wasnt busy time day 2 people front desk waited 20 minutes checkedin busy talking phone service soso entered dark curtains dusts flying fine size average european hotel definitely party hotel tons people lobby bar evening party noise welcomed

Reviews.Content: hotel basic tea coffee services breafast staff excellent chatted helpful reception staff forthcoming offering information hotel tourist returned hotel 7 evenings entertainment hotel restaurant facilities class hotel 23
